body.p: Michael Orton achieved his results on slide film by using two exposures of the same scene: one well exposed and one overexposed; he then used a darkroom technique to blend those into a final image where the overexposed image was blurred.

This module is almost a copy of Orton's analogue process into the digital domain. You can control brightness and blur with the provided parameters; we also add a control for saturation of the overexposured image for more play.
